title: America Needs Page 1 Rewrite, Wall Street Mafia 9.24.20
itunes:title: America Needs Page 1 Rewrite, Wall Street Mafia 9.24.20
description:
In episode 722, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Worst Idea Of All Time Podcast co-host Guy Montgomery to discuss fascism in America, the 2020 election, the grand jury charging one officer with wanton endangerment in the Breonna Taylor case, Ron Johnson trying to bring up the Hunter Biden allegations again, capitalism being broken, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Applauds Fed Violence Against Journalists: ‘It’s Actually A Beautiful Sight’
  2. Where Running Over Protesters Could Become Legal
  3. The Election That Could Break America
  4. The Deadline That Could Hand Trump the Election
  5. Wounded officer in Breonna Taylor case emails cops: 'I’m proof they do not care about you'
  6. Actions of officer who killed Breonna Taylor ruled ‘justified;’ Another charged with wanton endangerment
  7. Police Sexual Misconduct: A National Scale Study of Arrested Officers
  8. RonJohn Expends Remaining Dignity On Rehash Of Bogus, Tired Biden Allegations
  9. Leak reveals $2tn of possibly corrupt US financial activity
  10. FinCEN Files: HSBC moved Ponzi scheme millions despite warning
  11. Billions in dirty money rolled through Deutsche Bank.
  12. World's richest 1% cause double CO2 emissions of poorest 50%, says Oxfam
  13. WATCH: Dal - Those Days (Feat. Leah Yeger)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
